parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate at which to insert revision symbol note

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate at which to insert revision symbol note

title: IDrawingDoc.InsertRevisionSymbol
description: Inserts a revision symbol note in this drawing.
signature:
Note InsertRevisionSymbol( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate at which to insert revision symbol note

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate at which to insert revision symbol note

returns: Pointer to the newly created INote object
remarks: To attach the revision symbol to entities in the drawing, the end-user must interactively preselect those entities. The revision symbol is then inserted with leaders to those selected entities. If there are no preselected entities, the symbol is free-standing.
